full_summary:
**Janitorial and Commercial Cleaning Services for the Consulate General of Canada in Sydney, Australia**
====================================================================

**Tender Reference and Documents**
--------------------------------

* Reference Number: PW-23-01027607
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: 22-210469-B
* Publication Date: 2023-02-24

**Notice Information**
-------------------

* Tender Title (English): Janitorial and Commercial Cleaning Services for the Consulate General of Canada in Sydney, Australia
* Tender Title (French): Services de conciergerie et de nettoyage commercial pour le Consulat général du Canada à Sydney, Australie
* Tender Status (English): Expired
* Tender Status (French): Expiré

**Procurement Details**
---------------------

* Contracting Entity Name: Foreign Affairs, Trade And Development (Department Of)
* Contracting Entity Address: 125 Sussex Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0G2, Canada
* End User Entities: Foreign Affairs, Trade And Development (Department Of)
* End User Entities Address: 125 Sussex Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0G2, Canada
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and others

**Scope of Work**
----------------

Global Affairs Canada, represented by the Consulate General of Canada in Sydney, Australia, invites bidders to submit a proposal for Janitorial and Commercial Cleaning Services. The scope of work includes:

* Cleaning and maintenance of the Mission's interior spaces (approximately 1,500 m2)
* Outdoor terrace space (150 m2)
* Detailed floor plans will be provided at contract award

**Contract Award**
----------------

The contract is expected to commence on June 1, 2023, and end on May 31, 2025.

**Attachments**
--------------

* Addendum 1: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/17/03a541aa98cb33fd9ad514879e042fd8/22-210469-b_-_addendum_1.pdf
* Request for Proposal (RFP): https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/24/21c7e37594ef0baaf5aff27fbfe8362e/22-210469-b-sydny-janitorial_and_com
